articles.title: Volcanic eruption may have triggered Europe's deadly Black Death plague - BBC
articles.description: A volcanic eruption may have set off a chain reaction that led to Europe's deadliest pandemic.
articles.content:
Helen BriggsEnvironment correspondent
The Black Death fundamentally altered medieval society
A volcanic eruption around the year 1345 may have set off a chain reaction that unleashed Europe's deadl… [+2932 chars]
